Activity: Arrive at the office. Check emails and review the plan for the day.
Catch up on industry news related to Health Informatics and EHR systems. I find this helps me stay informed about best practices and potential solutions.
Complete root cause analysis documentation for the third and fourth data quality issues.

Begin the categorization process. Create a preliminary list of common themes based on the root causes identified so far (e.g., training gaps, system errors, workflow inefficiencies, data definition issues).
Refine the categorization framework. Define specific criteria for each category to ensure consistent application.
Categorize the root causes identified for the first four data quality issues into the defined categories.
Review the categorization with @qatest-1 and @qatest-2 (Quality Assurance Testers) to get feedback. The topic is 'Categorization Framework Review'.
Adjust the categorization framework based on feedback from @qatest-1 and @qatest-2
Document the categorization process and the rationale behind each assignment.
Review completed tasks for the day and plan for Thursday's activities. Ensure all documentation is organized and easily accessible.
